mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.zhiyuanzhe_id as zhiyuanzheId ,a.chat_issue as chatIssue ,a.issue_time as issueTime ,a.chat_reply as chatReply ,a.reply_time as replyTime ,a.zhuangtai_types as zhuangtaiTypes ,a.chat_types as chatTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_name as zhiyuanzheName ,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_phone as zhiyuanzhePhone ,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_id_number as zhiyuanzheIdNumber ,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_photo as zhiyuanzhePhoto ,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_email as zhiyuanzheEmail
FROM chat a left JOIN zhiyuanzhe zhiyuanzhe ON a.zhiyuanzhe_id = zhiyuanzhe.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.zhiyuanzhe_id = #{params.zhiyuanzheId} )
and a.chat_issue like CONCAT('%',#{params.chatIssue},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.issue_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.issueTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.issue_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.issueTimeEnd})
and a.chat_reply like CONCAT('%',#{params.chatReply},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.reply_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.replyTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.reply_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.replyTimeEnd})
and a.zhuangtai_types = #{params.zhuangtaiTypes}
and a.chat_types = #{params.chatTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.zhiyuanzhe_id IS NOT NULL
and zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheName},'%')
and zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzhePhone},'%')
and zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheIdNumber},'%')
and zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
